other_tests.findings: Minimal nonspecific S-T changes preoperatively; marked ST depression in the inferolateral leads post-ondansetron administration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: ECG abnormalities disappeared within 1 hour post-treatment and subsequent ECGs were unchanged from the preoperative tracings.

other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of well-differentiated adenocarcinoma with bronchioloalveolar features.
Patient exercised 7 min achieving a maximum heart rate of 150 beats/min without chest pain or ECG changes.
Normal left ventricular systolic function with mild tricuspid and mitral insufficiency.
Rare premature ventricular contractions and premature atrial contractions with three nonsustained runs of asymptomatic supraventricular tachycardia; no evidence of significant ischemia.
